function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Surface-to-person transmission via contact with infected surfaces or objects","Impact":"Increased risk of virus spread and infection","Mitigation":"Regular cleaning and disinfection of surfaces, promoting hand hygiene","Technologies":"UV-C disinfection systems, antimicrobial surfaces","People":"Building occupants, visitors, and workers","Owner":"Building management and cleaning staff"},{"Description":"Person-to-person transmission via direct contact or airborne respiratory droplets","Impact":"Increased risk of virus spread and infection","Mitigation":"Social distancing, wearing masks, improving ventilation systems","Technologies":"Air purifiers, HVAC filtration upgrades","People":"Building occupants, visitors, and workers","Owner":"Building management and health authorities"},{"Description":"Impact of poor indoor environmental quality on health and well-being","Impact":"Negative effects on occupants' health, happiness, and productivity","Mitigation":"Improving air quality, reducing stress, promoting physical activity","Technologies":"Air quality monitors, green materials, indoor plants","People":"Building occupants","Owner":"Building management and construction professionals"}]}
